Detailed Description

template<class AbstractProduct, class Id, class ConsArg, class ProductRef = AbstractProduct *, class IdComp = std::less<Id>>
class TREX::utils::Factory< AbstractProduct, Id, ConsArg, ProductRef, IdComp >::producer

Abstract producer type.

This class provides an abstract interface to manipulate a factory producer. This class behaves like a functor that can be accessed through the Factory access methods.

See also:
Factory::get(typename boost::call_traits<Id>::param_type) const
Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

typedef boost::call_traits<ConsArg>::param_type TREX::utils::Factory< AbstractProduct, Id, ConsArg, ProductRef, IdComp >::producer::argument_type

Production argument type.

This type is used to pass the production argument to this functor to produce a new product

Member Function Documentation

template<class AbstractProduct, class Id, class ConsArg, class ProductRef = AbstractProduct *, class IdComp = std::less<Id>>
void TREX::utils::Factory< AbstractProduct, Id, ConsArg, ProductRef, IdComp >::producer::declareMe (  )  const [inline, protected]

Registration to the Factory.

This method registers current instance to the Factory

Precondition:
The identifier of this producer is not currently declared in the Factory
Exceptions:
MultipleFactoryDecl Another producer has been declared in the Factory with the ID of this producer
See also:
producer(id_param)
Factory::add(Factory::producer const *)

result_type TREX::utils::Factory< AbstractProduct, Id, ConsArg, ProductRef, IdComp >::producer::operator() ( argument_type  arg  )  const [inline]

production operator

Parameters:
[in] arg production argument

Creates a new AbstractProduct using the argument arg.

It calls the virtual method produce which implements the craetion of the new object.

Returns:
A ProductRef to the newly created product
